summary:
*A.I. Artificial Intelligence* is a 2001 sci-fi movie directed by Steven Spielberg. It's about a futuristic world where robots are very real. The story follows David, a special android who can feel love, played by Haley Joel Osment. The film was based on a short story by Brian Aldiss and was originally planned by director Stanley Kubrick.

The movie took a long time to make because of the complex technology needed. After Kubrick's death, Spielberg finished the project. It was well-received, earning positive reviews and nominations for Academy Awards. Many critics consider it one of the best films of the 21st century.
title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
